name: Pop Lab
description:
Oh no! Our lab is swarming with these filthy microbes!
We need your help popping those microbes and cleaning the lab.

-The Lab-
We know their weak point. They are greedy trying to get bigger and bigger.
Our job is to merge identical microbes to grow them, until they are too big to grow and explode!


-Gameplay-
The gameplay is simple. Place microbes on the board in a way that they have an identical neighbor in any directions. Identicals combine with the one you just placed and get bigger. If you can grow them to the maximum size(5), they explode and POP! Last as long as you can to score better.


-Features-

+ Adorable Graphics with cute little characters.
+ Funny animations.
+ 25 different microbes
+ Merge in 8 directions
+ Rotate double microbe pieces
+ Rewind button; if you think you made a mistake
+ Leaderboards
+ Share a GIF of your game summary
+ Earn daily rewinds


We're calling you to merge these silly microbes and pop them out of this world.
Will you kindly help us to clean the lab?
Let's merge and grow the microbes to their goodbye.
